title: CHARTOU Womens Chic Floral Embroidered High-Rise Bell Bottom Flare Jeans Broad Feet Long Denim Pants
description: 【Features】Embroidery Designs are the hottest latest trend in women's fashion industry. They are considered so stylish nowadays. If you are looking for a sexy high waist bell-bottomed jeans broad feet pants that can make your body curves shine bright like a diamond, then this will be your favorite jeans
【Highlight Your Figure】High waisted flare bell bottom jeans for women with a little butt lifting will easily highlight your charming figure
【70s Vintage Bootcut Jeans】This embroidered stretch flare denim jeans pants is perfect for your causal wear, special retro party, or work wear
【Match】You can fashionably style it with a white short off shoulder crop top or other tops as shown on the attached picture. This style is so attractive and glamorous
【Garment care】High-quality denim fabric provided enough elasticity, and softness. Washing with cold water. Do not Bleach. Hang Dry. Do not Dry Clean
